casebody.data:
99-0578 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE of Louisiana v. James R. LITTLE. No. 99-KK-0578. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Little, James R.; — Defendants); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Catahoula 7th Judicial District Court Div. “A” Number 98-0616; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number KW98-1276

Denied.

KNOLL, J. not on panel.
